s: No medicinal smell like some other brands. I was dreading it, but was no problem. VERY expensive but that was following my surgeon’s instructions. ... This product is useful in that it has all the necessary nutrients needed to help with wound healing after surgery. However, it is overpriced and high in sugar. The amount of sugar in one bottle is 19g, which is pretty much equivalent to drinking a sugary beverage, like soda every day. I recommend Ensure ...
